dmca.title: Personal Defamation
dmca.body:
SRSPLUS
 

Dear Sirs,

 

I?m contacting you on behalf of my client, Mr. Dr. Pedro Cesar Busleiman.

 

It has come to my client attention that you appear to be hosting a web site which only purpuse is to damage the reputation and character of Mr. Dr. Busleiman.

 

The web site is: http://www.noteoperesaca.com

 

After reviewing the activity of that web site  we believe that all the content is defamatory and constitute libel per se and that the web page you are hosting clearly infringes Mr. Dr. Busleiman rights.

 

The purpose of this letter is to advise you of my client's rights and to seek your agreement to disable or remove the above mentioned web page. 

 

Please confirm, in writing, that you have complied with the above request.

 

We await your response within 24 hours.

 

Very truly yours,

 

 

Gustavo Daniel Tan?s
Attorney at Law
------------------------------------------------------
[private] 2180, 2? piso
[private] Buenos Aires, Argentina
Tel: (54 11) [private]
Email: [private]@[private].com.ar
URL: www.ciberderecho.com.ar 
URL: www.protecciondedatos.com.ar
